projects.title: Ratata
highlights: Collaboration of four creators of various backgrounds
Created in 48 hours for [Global Game Jam](https://globalgamejam.org/) 2019

projects.title: nbspacer
projects.summary: Replaces regular spaces in HTML documents with non-breaking spaces (` `) where appropriate
highlights: Conservative (<abbr title="Version control system">VCS</abbr>-friendly) - leaves the rest of the document intact
Supports two languages: Czech and English

projects.title: GeoSign
projects.summary: Assists Czech land surveyors in digitally signing documents and submitting them to cadastre offices

projects.title: PDF Manipulation Utility
projects.summary: A command-line tool for manipulation with PDF documents
highlights: Supports inspection and modification of properties, digital signatures and attachments

projects.title: missls
highlights: Originally created in 48 hours for the game jam [Ludum Dare 32](http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/)
Interesting features: minimalistic design, vector graphics, 2D planetary physics

projects.title: Static Analysis Suite
projects.summary: Extension of Clang Static Analyzer with custom checkers
highlights: Feasibility study of replacement of Coverity with Clang Static Analyser
Created for CERN (group: [<abbr title="Physics/Software">PH/SFT</abbr>](https://ep-dep.web.cern.ch/organisation/sft)) as a part of Summer Student Programme

projects.title: Magic Dance Dance Carpet
highlights: Collaboration of five students of various backgrounds
Interesting features: dance pad controls, concave world
Created for the course [Computer games development](https://artemis.ms.mff.cuni.cz/main/tiki-index.php?page=Computer%20games%20development) at Charles University
